full_summary:
=====================================


## Government Tender Announcement

### Project: Request for Proposal for Plant Growth Cabinet

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS3728465376
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3728465376
* **Publication Date:** 2022-11-09
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-12-15T14:00:00
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Project Description

The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) requires the supply, installation, and delivery of one controlled environment Plant Growth Chamber for the Plant Gene Resource of Canada (PGRC) located in Saskatoon, SK.

#### Tender Requirements

* Bids must be submitted on December 15, 2022 by 14:00 EST.
* All supporting documentation must be included with the bid submission.
* Bids submitted after 14:00 EST on December 15, 2022 will be considered non-responsive.

#### Contact Information

* **Name:** Fatima Vallee (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** fatima.vallee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** Not specified
* **Fax:** Not specified

#### Documents and Attachments

* Tender documents and attachments can be accessed through the Ariba Discovery posting.

**End of Notice.**

Note that I condensed the information into smaller sections and only included the most important details. I also rephrased some of the language to make it sound more professional. Let me know if you'd like me to make any changes!
